Dropdown #

  • Semantic HTML
  • Parameters
  • Slot

Semantic HTML #

     <x-dropdown 
           label="Dropdown Label" 
           :items="[
             ['label'=>'Label 1','url' => 'https://www.link1.com'],
             ['label'=>'Label 2','url' => 'https://www.link2.com']
           ]" 
     >
    </x-dropdown>

Parameters #

AttributeDefaultTypeRequiredAvailable valuesDescription
positionleftStringnorightBy default, dropdown items will stick to the left, but adding position right, it will make dropdown items sticks to the right.
expandfalseBooleannotruetrue will expand the dropdown items list in large screens min-width:992px
hoverablefalseBooleannotruetrue will change the dropdown design to hover design instead of click design.
items-Arrayyes-Dropdown items array, each item must include two properties label and url
label-Stringyes-Label of dropdown
class-Stringno-Custom classes will add to .dropdown div

Slot #

No slot for dropdown component
